the album kraterov the titular councillor a thin and slender a the admiralti spire step forward and address zhmyhov said: your excel move and touch to the bottom of our heart by the way you have rule u dure long year and by your fatherli care dure the cours of more than ten year zakusin prompt dure the cours of more than ten year we your subordin on thi so memor for u er day beg your excel to accept in token of our respect and profound gratitud thi album with our portrait in it and express our hope that for the durat of your distinguish life that for long long year to come to your die day you may not abandon u with your fatherli guidanc in the path of justic and progress ad zakusin wipe from hi brow the perspir that had suddenli appear on it he wa evid long to speak and in all probabl had a speech readi and he wound up may your standard fli for long long year in the career of geniu industri and social self conscious a tear trickl down the wrinkl left cheek of zhmyhov gentleman he said in a shake voic i did not expect i had no idea that you were go to celebr my modest jubile i am touch inde veri much so i shall not forget thi moment to my die day and believ me believ me friend that no one is so desir of your welfar a i am and if there ha been anyth it wa for your benefit zhmyhov the actual civil councillor kiss the titular councillor kraterov who had not expect such an honour and turn pale with delight then the chief made a gestur that signifi that he could not speak for emot and shed tear a though an expens album had not been present to him but on the contrari taken from him then when he had a littl recov and said a few more word full of feel and given everyon hi hand to shake he went downstair amid loud and joy cheer got into hi carriag and drove off follow by their bless a he sat in hi carriag he wa awar of a flood of joyou feel such a he had never known befor and onc more he shed tear at home new delight await him there hi famili hi friend and acquaint had prepar him such an ovat that it seem to him that he realli had been of veri great servic to hi countri and that if he had never exist hi countri would perhap have been in a veri bad way the jubile dinner wa made up of toast speech and tear in short zhmyhov had never expect that hi merit would be so warmli appreci gentleman he said befor the dessert two hour ago i wa recompens for all the suffer a man ha to undergo who is the servant so to say not of routin not of the letter but of duti through the whole durat of my servic i have constantli adher to the principl â€”the public doe not exist for u but we for the public and to day i receiv the highest reward my subordin present me with an album see i wa touch festiv face bent over the album and began examin it it s a pretti album said zhmyhov s daughter olya it must have cost fifti roubl i do believ oh it s charm you must give me the album papa do you hear? i ll take care of it it s so pretti after dinner olya carri off the album to her room and shut it up in her tabl drawer next day she took the clerk out of it flung them on the floor and put her school friend in their place the govern uniform made way for white pelerin kolya hi excel s littl son pick up the clerk and paint their cloth red those who had no moustach he present with green moustach and ad brown beard to the beardless when there wa noth left to paint he cut the littl men out of the card board prick their eye with a pin and began play soldier with them after cut out the titular councillor kraterov he fix him on a match box and carri him in that state to hi father s studi papa a monument look zhmyhov burst out laugh lurch forward and look tenderli at the child gave him a warm kiss on the cheek there you rogu go and show mamma let mamma look too
